connections.connectWalletDesc: Connect your Web3 wallet to start using the secure SSH connection manager. All configuration data will be encrypted and stored on the blockchain, ensuring data security and privacy protection.
connections.authenticationDesc: For security purposes, digital signature verification of your wallet identity is required. After verification is complete, you can start creating and managing SSH connection configurations.
connections.clickVerifyButton: Click the "Verify Identity" button above to complete the setup

terminal.connectWalletDesc: Please connect your OKX wallet or other WalletConnect compatible wallet to use the SSH terminal. All your connections will go through secure encrypted channels.
terminal.registrationDesc: Please register your wallet address first to use the SSH terminal. The registration process is quick and simple.
terminal.clickConnectButton: Click the connect wallet button in the top right corner to start registration
terminal.sessionNotFoundDesc: SSH session with ID "{sessionId}" was not found. It may have been closed or does not exist.

about.productDesc: Nexion is a revolutionary SSH management tool that perfectly combines traditional server management with Web3 technology. Through blockchain technology, it achieves decentralized storage of configurations, replaces traditional key management with encrypted wallets, providing enterprises and developers with more secure and convenient server access solutions.

unifiedAuth.title: Wallet Authentication
unifiedAuth.description: Use Web3 wallet for secure authentication, farewell to traditional key management

decentralizedStorage.title: Blockchain Storage
decentralizedStorage.description: Configuration data encrypted and stored on X Layer blockchain, never lost

secureConnection.title: End-to-End Encryption
secureConnection.description: Military-grade encryption algorithms protect all data transmission and storage

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Device Sync
crossPlatform.description: Access all your SSH configurations on any device by simply connecting your wallet

about.contactDesc: Nexion is developed by a professional Web3 technology team, committed to providing secure and efficient server management solutions for enterprises and individual developers. We believe that decentralized technology will redefine the future of infrastructure management.
